trans-unit.source: Represents a selection of content that an annotation is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: 表示附註錨定 (Anchor) 的內容選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor> is the object type of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.ResolvedAnchor%2A> if you are using sticky notes and highlights in flow or fixed documents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor> 傳回的物件類型<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.ResolvedAnchor%2A>如果您使用 「 自黏便箋及流量或固定格式文件中的反白顯示。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor> 中導入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Consider a simple document reader application that has a comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮具有註解 窗格的簡單的文件讀取器應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The comments pane might be a list box that displays the text from a list of annotations that are anchored to a document.
trans-unit.target: 註解窗格可能是清單方塊，其中顯示來自錨定到文件之註釋清單的文字。

trans-unit.source: If the user selects an item in the list box, then the application brings into view the paragraph in the document that the corresponding annotation object is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者在清單方塊中選取項目，則應用程式會將對應註釋物件所錨定之文件中的段落帶入檢視。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何為這類作為註解窗格的清單方塊實作事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end position of the text anchor.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字錨定的結束位置。

trans-unit.source: The end position of the text anchor.
trans-unit.target: 文字錨定的結束位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor.BoundingEnd%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor.BoundingEnd%2A> 中導入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the beginning position of the text anchor.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字錨定的開頭位置。

trans-unit.source: The beginning position of the text anchor.
trans-unit.target: 文字錨定的開頭位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor.BoundingStart%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor.BoundingStart%2A> 中導入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Consider a simple document reader application that has a comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮具有註解 窗格的簡單的文件讀取器應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The comments pane might be a list box that displays the text from a list of annotations that are anchored to a document.
trans-unit.target: 註解窗格可能是清單方塊，其中顯示來自錨定到文件之註釋清單的文字。

trans-unit.source: If the user selects an item in the list box, then the application brings into view the paragraph in the document that the corresponding annotation object is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者在清單方塊中選取項目，則應用程式會將對應註釋物件所錨定之文件中的段落帶入檢視。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何為這類作為註解窗格的清單方塊實作事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to.
trans-unit.target: 要相比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the text anchor is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，表示文字錨定是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個執行個體相等，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor.Equals%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor.Equals%2A> 中導入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code of the text anchor instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回文字錨定執行個體的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code of the text anchor instance.
trans-unit.target: 文字錨定執行個體的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor.GetHashCode%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor.GetHashCode%2A> 中導入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。
